abstract: A challenge filed by Brian Lewis Bromberg to an exemption from an 8 percent surtax for monthly parkers was rejected by a federal appeals court.
snippet: A challenge filed by Brian Lewis Bromberg to an exemption from an 8 percent surtax for monthly parkers was rejected by a federal appeals court.
lead_paragraph: Since he moved to Manhattan from Brooklyn in the early 1990s, Brian Lewis Bromberg has been an on-and-off car owner.

headline.main: Manhattan Lawyer Fights Tax Break That Helps Him
